content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper Plate Mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill is currently out of fuel
-  Stone furnace is currently out of fuel
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) waiting for source items
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5) is currently out of fuel

### Copper Plate Mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0) with no ingredients

### Electricity Generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Offshore pump is working
-  Boiler is currently out of fuel
-  Steam engine is not connected

### Transport Belt at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5) both working

### Pipe Group at position(x=107.5 y=-34.5)
Consists of pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) empty and pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5) full output

### Electricity Group at position(x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)
Consists of electricity group (position x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668) not plugged into electric network

### Belt Group at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5) empty

### ERROR TIPS
*   Errors when entities are out of fuel: 
    -  Ensure that entities are properly fueled before use
    -  Regularly check entity status to prevent fuel depletion
*   Errors when entities are not connected: 
    -  Ensure that entities are properly connected before use
    -  Regularly check entity status to prevent disconnection
*   Errors when entities are not plugged into electric network: 
    -  Ensure that entities are properly plugged into electric network before use
    -  Regularly check entity status to prevent disconnection from electric network
*   Errors when entities are waiting for source items: 
    -  Ensure that source items are available before use
    -  Regularly check entity status to prevent waiting for source items
*   Errors when entities have no ingredients: 
    -  Ensure that ingredients are available before use
    -  Regularly check entity status to prevent lack of ingredients

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables have been defined or invoked in the provided execution logs.
